net.sf.jclec.mo.strategy

Class MOStrategyContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.mo.strategy.MOStrategyContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IPopulation, net.sf.jclec.ISystem, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, IMOPopulation, net.sf.jclec.util.random.IRandGenFactory

    public final class MOStrategyContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMOPopulation
    Execution context required by the strategy. It stores general properties of the optimization process that are needed by the strategy and specific tools (e.g., selectors). The context should be conveniently created and updated by the multi-objective algorithm.

    History:

    • (AR|JRR|SV, 1.0, March 2018) First release.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aurora Ramirez (AR), Jose Raul Romero (JRR), Sebastian Ventura (SV)

    Knowledge Discovery and Intelligent Systems (KDIS) Research Group: http://www.uco.es/grupos/kdis

    See Also:
    MOStrategy, IMOPopulation, IMOAlgorithm, Serialized Form
